original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v WHERE p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-01 12:12:41' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score<=44 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=3 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-11 13:53:56' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-03 11:52:36' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-11 17:26:31' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-20 19:11:45' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-01 12:12:41'
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-20 19:11:45'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E4.PostId=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1 AND postLinks.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-11 17:26:31'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E4E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E4E5.PostId=E3.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score <= 44 AND (CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) <= 3) AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-11 13:53:56' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-03 11:52:36')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E5E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E4E5E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E4E5E3.PostId=E2.Id)
